name: My Design Portfolio
overview: Keeping a design portfolio up to date is critical when marketing yourself in a competitive field. I regularly evaluate my portfolio against other designers and blogs to compare the presentation of work.

name: eCommerce UI Enhancement
overview: Following the initial release, users found the product outdated and difficult to use. I compared user pain points with a sitewide heuristic evaluation and supportive research to address user concerns and meet stakeholder requirements.

name: eCommerce Account Manager
overview: I presented the client and internal stakeholders a new concept that would remove an interstitial page. Thus, reducing development scope and adding value to the users’ experience.

name: Enterprise Time Entry
overview: I worked as a consultant alongside two other UX designers to enhance the client’s custom application for logging time. The project focus was to identify user pain points and potential solutions that would save time, address accuracy, and encourage consistent submission of their timesheets.

name: Handheld Medical Records
overview: I provided this client with user research for developing analytical data metrics on their iPad application that would allow medical volunteers, administration, and financial supporters to evaluate their operational efficiency during and after medical mission trips.

name: Mobile In-Flight Incentives
overview: I was tasked with creating a concept application flight attendants could use to send passengers incentives based on their poor customer experience.

name: Custom Design System
overview: Through self-motivation and to bridge communication between designers and developers. I converted our PDF pattern library into an interactive and responsive UI Toolkit using PHP, JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

name: Startup Website Enhancements
overview: This is a very long description...

name: And soon to be more...
overview: Additional projects and content are in the process of being processed and added.
